summary: Changes the Cost, Power, and Duration of a few spells
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]This is a small mod that changes the costs and lengths of a few spells

The specifics are:
[b]
[size=6][center]Cost[/center][/size]
[/b]
[size=4] Mage-Flesh:[/size]

Oak-Flesh: 50 Base Mana

Stone-Flesh: 100 Base Mana

Iron-Flesh: 150 Base Mana

Ebony-Flesh: 200 Base Mana

Dragon-Hide: 250 Base Mana

[size=4]
Wards:[/size]

[size=2] Lesser Ward: 10 Base Mana[/size][size=2]
[/size]
[size=2] Stead-Fast Ward: 25 Base Mana[/size]

[size=2] Greater Ward: 50 Base Mana[/size]

[size=4]
Invisibility: 250 Base Mana[/size]


[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6]Durat[/size][size=6]ion[/size]

[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode] [size=4] Mage-Flesh: AllÂ 30 Minutes[/size]

[size=4]Invisibility: 2 Minutes
[/size]
[size=6][center]Power[/center][/size]
[size=4] Wards:[/size]

Lesser Ward: 50 Points

Stead-Fast Ward: 75 Points

Greater Ward: 100 Points

[size=2]If you want me to do anything other spell leave a message[/size]
Thanks for checking out this mod![/font]
author: Shadowbandit
